(1)幽深奥妙。

賾字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　賾； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1211第23
〔古文〕?【廣韻】士革切，音嘖。【易·繫辭】聖人有以見天下之賾。【疏】謂幽深難見。【釋文】賾，京氏作嘖。○按徐鉉說文敘辨俗書譌謬，不合六書之體者，以賾爲假借之字，當通用嘖。　【集韻】賾或作?。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Beijing Department] 　赜; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1211 Page 23
[Ancient text]? [Guangyun] Shige cut, sound tusk. [Yi·Ci] The saint can see the world. 【Sparse】It is said that it is deep and difficult to see. 【Explanation】赜, Jing clan. ○According to Xu Xuan's narrative, discriminate the common book absurdity. Those who do not fit in the style of the six books will use 赜 as a phony word for general use.　【Ji Yun】赜 or Zuo?.
